name: div
features: Ergonomic Design : Engineered for a personalized fit & maximum protection
Gel-to-Shell® Technology : Air-activated material transforms from a malleable gel into a customized, form-fitting shield in 30 minutes
Dispersion Technology : Deflects and disperses impact across the guard for efficient, full-coverage protection
Custom Molding Gear : Creates a one-to-one personalized fit for each player using Gel-to-Shell® Technology
Comfort Lining : Moisture-wicking interior improves overall feel & comfort
3D Cloud Mesh : Raised-texture base material enhances appearance and structure
Small and Large Sizes : Small fits arms <10", large fits arms >10"; measure bicep circumference just above the elbow for best fit
